mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ocean Springs Community Center Murals, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Anderson, Walter Inglis (American painter and designer, 1903-1965) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: North Wall: The Seven Climates of Ocean Springs, Mars

The city of Ocean Springs commissioned Anderson to execute the murals in 1950 for a fee of $1.00. They were completed after 16 months in 1951-52. -- http://www.kiwithebeauty.com/things-to-do-in-coastal-mississippi-beyond-the-casinos/ [work]
